verses.verse: Maschil <S%H4905><s%> of Ethan <S%H387><s%> the Ezrahite. <S%H250><s%> I will sing <S%H7891><s%> of the mercies <S%H2617><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for ever: <S%H5769><s%> with my mouth <S%H6310><s%> will I make known <S%H3045><s%> your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> to all generations. <S%H1755><s%>

For I have said, <S%H559><s%> Mercy <S%H2617><s%> shall be built <S%H1129><s%> up for ever: <S%H5769><s%> your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> shall you establish <S%H3559><s%> in the very heavens. <S%H8064><s%>
I have made <S%H3772><s%> a covenant <S%H1285><s%> with my chosen, <S%H972><s%> I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> my servant, <S%H5650><s%>
Your seed <S%H2233><s%> will I establish <S%H3559><s%> for ever, <S%H5769><s%> and build <S%H1129><s%> up your throne <S%H3678><s%> to all generations. <S%H1755><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

And the heavens <S%H8064><s%> shall praise <S%H3034><s%> your wonders, <S%H6382><s%> O LORD: <S%H3068><s%> your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> also <S%H637><s%> in the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of the saints. <S%H6918><s%>

For who <S%H4310><s%> in the heaven <S%H7834><s%> can be compared <S%H6186><s%> to the LORD? <S%H3068><s%> who among the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the mighty <S%H410><s%> can be likened <S%H1819><s%> to the LORD? <S%H3068><s%>

God <S%H410><s%> is greatly <S%H7227><s%> to be feared <S%H6206><s%> in the assembly <S%H5475><s%> of the saints, <S%H6918><s%> and to be had in reverence <S%H3372><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> them that are about <S%H5439><s%> him.

O LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> is a strong <S%H2626><s%> LORD <S%H3050><s%> like <S%H3644><s%> to you? or to your faithfulness <S%H530><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about you?
You rule <S%H4910><s%> the raging <S%H1348><s%> of the sea: <S%H3220><s%> when the waves <S%H1530><s%> thereof arise, <S%H7721><s%> you still <S%H7623><s%> them.

You have broken <S%H1792><s%> Rahab <S%H7294><s%> in pieces, as one that is slain; <S%H2491><s%> you have scattered <S%H6340><s%> your enemies <S%H341><s%> with your strong <S%H5797><s%> arm. <S%H2220><s%>
The heavens <S%H8064><s%> are yours, the earth <S%H776><s%> also <S%H637><s%> is yours: as for the world <S%H8398><s%> and the fullness <S%H4393><s%> thereof, you have founded <S%H3245><s%> them.
The north <S%H6828><s%> and the south <S%H3225><s%> you have created <S%H1254><s%> them: Tabor <S%H8396><s%> and Hermon <S%H2768><s%> shall rejoice <S%H7442><s%> in your name. <S%H8034><s%>
You have a mighty <S%H1369><s%> arm: <S%H2220><s%> strong <S%H5810><s%> is your hand, <S%H3027><s%> and high <S%H7311><s%> is your right <S%H3225><s%> hand. <S%H3225><s%>

Justice <S%H6664><s%> and judgment <S%H4941><s%> are the habitation <S%H4349><s%> of your throne: <S%H3678><s%> mercy <S%H2617><s%> and truth <S%H571><s%> shall go <S%H6923><s%> before your face. <S%H6440><s%>

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the people <S%H5971><s%> that know <S%H3045><s%> the joyful <S%H8643><s%> sound: <S%H8643><s%> they shall walk, <S%H1980><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> in the light <S%H216><s%> of your countenance. <S%H6440><s%>
In your name <S%H8034><s%> shall they rejoice <S%H1523><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the day: <S%H3117><s%> and in your righteousness <S%H6666><s%> shall they be exalted. <S%H7311><s%>
For you are the glory <S%H8597><s%> of their strength: <S%H5797><s%> and in your favor <S%H7522><s%> our horn <S%H7161><s%> shall be exalted. <S%H7311><s%>
For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is our defense; <S%H4043><s%> and the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is our king. <S%H4428><s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> you spoke <S%H1696><s%> in vision <S%H2377><s%> to your holy <S%H2623><s%> one, and said, <S%H559><s%> I have laid <S%H7737><s%> help <S%H5828><s%> on one that is mighty; <S%H1368><s%> I have exalted <S%H7311><s%> one chosen <S%H970><s%> out of the people. <S%H5971><s%>
I have found <S%H4672><s%> David <S%H1732><s%> my servant; <S%H5650><s%> with my holy <S%H6944><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%> have I anointed <S%H4886><s%> him:
With whom <S%H834><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> shall be established: <S%H3559><s%> my arm <S%H2220><s%> also <S%H637><s%> shall strengthen <S%H553><s%> him.
The enemy <S%H341><s%> shall not exact <S%H5378><s%> on him; nor <S%H3808><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of wickedness <S%H5766><s%> afflict <S%H6031><s%> him.
And I will beat <S%H3807><s%> down his foes <S%H6862><s%> before his face, <S%H6440><s%> and plague <S%H5063><s%> them that hate <S%H8130><s%> him.
But my faithfulness <S%H530><s%> and my mercy <S%H2617><s%> shall be with him: and in my name <S%H8034><s%> shall his horn <S%H7161><s%> be exalted. <S%H7311><s%>
I will set <S%H7760><s%> his hand <S%H3027><s%> also in the sea, <S%H3220><s%> and his right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> in the rivers. <S%H5104><s%>
He shall cry <S%H7121><s%> to me, You are my father, <S%H1><s%> my God, <S%H410><s%> and the rock <S%H6697><s%> of my salvation. <S%H3444><s%>
Also <S%H637><s%> I will make <S%H5414><s%> him my firstborn, <S%H1060><s%> higher <S%H5945><s%> than the kings <S%H4428><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>
My mercy <S%H2617><s%> will I keep <S%H8104><s%> for him for ever more, <S%H5769><s%> and my covenant <S%H1285><s%> shall stand <S%H539><s%> fast with him.
His seed <S%H2233><s%> also will I make <S%H7760><s%> to endure for ever, <S%H5703><s%> and his throne <S%H3678><s%> as the days <S%H3117><s%> of heaven. <S%H8064><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> his children <S%H1121><s%> forsake <S%H5800><s%> my law, <S%H8451><s%> and walk <S%H3212><s%> not in my judgments; <S%H4941><s%>
If <S%H518><s%> they break <S%H2490><s%> my statutes, <S%H2708><s%> and keep <S%H8104><s%> not my commandments; <S%H4687><s%>
Then will I visit <S%H6485><s%> their transgression <S%H6588><s%> with the rod, <S%H7626><s%> and their iniquity <S%H5771><s%> with stripes. <S%H5061><s%>
Nevertheless my loving kindness <S%H2617><s%> will I not utterly take <S%H6331><s%> from him, nor <S%H3808><s%> suffer my faithfulness <S%H530><s%> to fail. <S%H8266><s%>
My covenant <S%H1285><s%> will I not break, <S%H2490><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> alter <S%H8138><s%> the thing that is gone <S%H4161><s%> out of my lips. <S%H8193><s%>
Once <S%H259><s%> have I sworn <S%H7650><s%> by my holiness <S%H6944><s%> that I will not lie <S%H3576><s%> to David. <S%H1732><s%>
His seed <S%H2233><s%> shall endure <S%H1961><s%> for ever, <S%H5769><s%> and his throne <S%H3678><s%> as the sun <S%H8121><s%> before <S%H5048><s%> me.
It shall be established <S%H3559><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> as the moon, <S%H3394><s%> and as a faithful <S%H539><s%> witness <S%H5707><s%> in heaven. <S%H7834><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
But you have cast <S%H2186><s%> off and abhorred, <S%H3988><s%> you have been wroth <S%H5674><s%> with your anointed. <S%H4899><s%>
You have made void <S%H5010><s%> the covenant <S%H1285><s%> of your servant: <S%H5650><s%> you have profaned <S%H2490><s%> his crown <S%H5145><s%> by casting it to the ground. <S%H776><s%>
You have broken <S%H6555><s%> down all <S%H3605><s%> his hedges; <S%H1448><s%> you have brought <S%H7760><s%> his strong <S%H4013><s%> holds <S%H4013><s%> to ruin. <S%H4288><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> that pass <S%H5674><s%> by the way <S%H1870><s%> spoil <S%H8155><s%> him: he is a reproach <S%H2781><s%> to his neighbors. <S%H7934><s%>
You have set <S%H7311><s%> up the right <S%H3225><s%> hand <S%H3225><s%> of his adversaries; <S%H6862><s%> you have made all <S%H3605><s%> his enemies <S%H341><s%> to rejoice. <S%H8055><s%>
You have also <S%H637><s%> turned <S%H7725><s%> the edge <S%H6697><s%> of his sword, <S%H2719><s%> and have not made him to stand <S%H6965><s%> in the battle. <S%H4421><s%>
You have made his glory <S%H2892><s%> to cease, <S%H7673><s%> and cast <S%H4048><s%> his throne <S%H3678><s%> down to the ground. <S%H776><s%>
The days <S%H3117><s%> of his youth <S%H5934><s%> have you shortened: <S%H7114><s%> you have covered <S%H5844><s%> him with shame. <S%H955><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
How <S%H5704><s%> long, <S%H5704><s%> LORD? <S%H3068><s%> will you hide <S%H5641><s%> yourself for ever? <S%H5331><s%> shall your wrath <S%H2534><s%> burn <S%H1197><s%> like fire? <S%H784><s%>
Remember <S%H2142><s%> how <S%H4100><s%> short <S%H2465><s%> my time is: why <S%H5921><s%> <S%H4100><s%> have you made all <S%H3605><s%> men <S%H1121><s%> <S%H120><s%> in vain? <S%H7723><s%>

What <S%H4310><s%> man <S%H1397><s%> is he that lives, <S%H2421><s%> and shall not see <S%H7200><s%> death? <S%H4194><s%> shall he deliver <S%H4422><s%> his soul <S%H5315><s%> from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the grave? <S%H7585><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>
Lord, <S%H136><s%> where <S%H346><s%> are your former <S%H7223><s%> loving kindnesses, <S%H2617><s%> which you swore <S%H7650><s%> to David <S%H1732><s%> in your truth? <S%H530><s%>

Remember, <S%H2142><s%> Lord, <S%H136><s%> the reproach <S%H2781><s%> of your servants; <S%H5650><s%> how I do bear <S%H5375><s%> in my bosom <S%H2436><s%> the reproach of all <S%H3605><s%> the mighty <S%H7227><s%> people; <S%H5971><s%>

With <S%H834><s%> which your enemies <S%H341><s%> have reproached, <S%H2778><s%> O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> with which <S%H834><s%> they have reproached <S%H2778><s%> the footsteps <S%H6119><s%> of your anointed. <S%H4899><s%>
Blessed <S%H1288><s%> be the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for ever more. <S%H5769><s%> Amen, <S%H543><s%> and Amen. <S%H543><s%>
